name: Dave Arnold's Thai Basil Daiquiri
description: This Thai basil daiquiri features fresh lime juice and white rum.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces white rum, such as Flor de Cana

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, pour blended mixture into shaker, shake until very cold. Strain through fine-mesh strainer into 2 cocktail glasses.
